name: Escape From School!
description:
The killer is chasing you through the corridors of your school.

You need to be cunning and smart to get away from this dangerous man. Who is he? Why is he chasing you? All the answers await in this new thriller game, where you need to make the right decisions to stay alive.

— Breathtaking graphics
— Story-driven game, your choice really matters
— Lots of different endings
— Hide or fight on your way to escape
